definition: A long, narrow space within a building, typically connecting different rooms or providing access to them. It is commonly used to refer to a hallway or corridor in residential or commercial buildings.

examples.german: Der Flur ist lang und schmal.
examples.english: The hallway is long and narrow.

examples.german: Wir haben einen großen Flur in unserem Haus.
examples.english: We have a large hallway in our house.

examples.german: Ich habe meine Jacke im Flur vergessen.
examples.english: I forgot my jacket in the hallway.

examples.german: Der Flur führt zu den Schlafzimmern.
examples.english: The hallway leads to the bedrooms.
